mapper.select: select * from member join assets_of_member on member.user_key = assets_of_member.user_key join assets on assets_of_member.assets_id = assets.assets_id where member.user_key = #{userKey};
mapper.insert: insert into assets_of_member (user_key, type, amount, assets_id, memo) values(1, #{type}, #{amount}, #{assetsId}, #{memo});
